directions.step:
For sauce, in a small saucepan combine all ingredients. Bring just to boiling. Brush sauce onto burgers to last 10 mins of grilling. Heat any remaining sauce just til bubbly; serve with burgers. Makes about 1 1/2 cups sauce, enough for 1 to 2 lbs of meat.
Recipe by: Better Homes & Gardens 7/96
